name: Cost: Minerals
description: Cost in Minerals to research this Upgrade.

name: Cost Factor: Minerals
description: Factor cost in Minerals to research this Upgrade.

name: Cost: Vespene Gas
description: Cost in Vespene Gas required to research this Upgrade.

name: Cost Factor: Vespene Gas
length: Factor Cost in Vespene Gas to research this Upgrade.

name: Cost: Research Time
description: Time required to research this Upgrade.

name: Cost Factor: Research Time
description: Factor Cost in Time required to research this Upgrade.

name: Unknown
description: Unknown, probably a set of flags for each upgrade. All upgrades have 0xFFFF.

name: Icon
description: Index of an icon in cmdicons.grp
values: Integer value between 0 and the last index of cmdicons.grp

name: Label
values: Integer value between 0 and the last index of rez\stat_txt.tbl

name: Race
description: Determines which races can research this upgrade.

name: Repeat
description: The number of times this upgrade can be researched.

name: Brood War Flag
description: Boolean flag which determines whether this upgrade is restricted to Brood War.
